name: Don't Want(on) Destruction
description:
You are a superhero who has the incredible power of super strength, levitation and the ability to shoot a powerful laser beam from your eyes! You also have a slight disability though. You can't NOT shoot a powerful laser beam from your eyes (except when turning, for some inexplicable reason).

Can you save all the innocent people while dealing with the baddies?

Made for lame jam 4

Credits:

Code & level design: Kayden Fox

Models: Emanuele Trapani

Music: Andrey Sitkov
